about_the_game:
Living Cell is a dark adventure game with elements of survival in a Samosbor setting.
Explore the living block room by room, avoid poisonous slimes and make sure that the filters of the gas mask do not die ahead of time, and the flashlight continues to shine.
Learn about the frightening stories of the inhabitants of Gigakhrushchevka by studying their life and surroundings.

Survive or become another consumable whose body will go to food concentrate after death.

Key features:
- Unique setting based on the Gigahrushchevka and Samosbor universe
- Gloomy and oppressive atmosphere of despair and decline
- Unusual gameplay combining elements of a quest, survival and various puzzles

content_descriptors.notes: Our game has scenes with bloodstains and corpses.

name: Living Cell Demo
short_description: You are the only liquidator in block G-326 of the endless Gigakhrushchevka who survived. Now you have to find out what happened in this block, evacuate the residents and find a way out for yourself. But is everything as obvious as it seems at first glance?
